Key Arguments: The submission suggests that the proposed legislation should include provisions for regulating authorised electoral and referendum content, professional news, and satire.
The argument is based on the belief that these types of content can have a detrimental impact on the Australian community.
Main Themes: Inclusion of electoral and referendum content in the legislation
Impact of professional news and satire on misinformation and disinformation
Notable Quotes: I believe the changes should also include authorised electoral and referendum content and other types of content such as professional news and satire as it has a detrimental impact directly on the community of Australia and not to be excluded.
